user.title: Airly
user.description:
Set up Airly air quality integration. To generate API key go to https://developer.airly.eu/registers 

 It is recommended to use the official version of integration, go to: https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/airly/

error.wrong_location: No Airly measuring stations in this area.

abort.already_configured: Airly integration for these coordinates is already configured.
